fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: The title for the site.

fields.label: Tagline
fields.description: A short tagline for the site.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: A meta description of the site.

fields.name: thumbnail
fields.label: Thumbnail
fields.description: A thumbnail to display on social media and in links.

fields.name: logo
fields.label: Logo
fields.description: The full logo as an SVG.

fields.name: logo_light
fields.label: Light Logo
fields.description: A light version of the logo.

fields.name: icon
fields.label: Icon
fields.description: A smaller icon as an SVG.

fields.name: icon_light
fields.label: Light Icon
fields.description: A light version smaller of the icon.

fields.name: address_url
fields.label: Address URL
fields.description: The URL you want your address to link to (Google Maps, etc.)

fields.name: hours
fields.label: Hours
fields.description: The hours of operation.

fields.name: day
fields.label: Day(s)
fields.description: Day of the week for the listed hours.

fields.name: hours
fields.label: Hours
fields.description: Open hours for this day.

fields.name: show_pickup
fields.label: Show pickup button
fields.description: Should we show the pickup button on the home page and footer?

fields.name: pickup
fields.label: Pickup URL
fields.description: Link to order pickup (used across the site).

fields.name: show_delivery
fields.label: Show delivery button?
fields.description: Should we show the delivery button on the home page and footer?

fields.name: delivery
fields.label: Delivery URL
fields.description: Link to order delivery (used across the site).

fields.name: announcement_text
fields.label: Announcement Text
fields.description: Enter an announcement. If this field is blank, the bar will not show on the site.

fields.name: announcement_url
fields.label: Announcement URL
fields.description: Enter an URL. If this field is blank, the bar will not link to anywhere.

fields.name: popup_script
fields.label: Popup Script
fields.description: Paste the code for an embedded popup below.

fields.name: buttons
fields.label: Additional Buttons
fields.description: Any additional buttons for the upper nav.

fields.label: Label
fields.description: The label for the button.

fields.name: url
fields.label: URL
fields.description: The url for the button.

fields.label: Show email sign up
fields.description: Should we display the email sign up in the footer?

fields.name: email_label
fields.label: Email Label
fields.description: Label for the email signup

fields.name: email_placeholder
fields.label: Email Placeholder Text
fields.description: Placeholder text for the email signup

fields.name: footer_sections
fields.label: Footer Sections
fields.description: Sections to hold links in the footer. The first section will always contain pickup and delivery buttons (if enabled).

fields.label: Links

fields.description: The label for the link.

fields.description: The url for the link.

fields.label: Blurb
fields.description: A blurb for the about section.
